page.title: 09A country house
page.content:
Sharnfold Cottage is a nice home because i can walk across the fields and i like it .Ican get strawberries from over the road because there is a pick-your-own-fruit opposite us.We have two horses and two stables and a paddock for the horses along the side of the house.We have six little chicks and a hen.I have a cat called sooty,my sister has a cat called fluff and my mum and dad have a cat called skippy.Our house was built by labourers from Preisthaws Farm.I think next-door was built at the same time.I like living in the country because it is quiet and calm unlike the busy town .I wish we could have a village shop instead of haveing to go into town.
Alan Glenister
